layout.description: Manually positioned cups with three-level approach

balance_safe_height.description:
Move the robot to a SAFE HEIGHT above the balance.
This should be high enough to clear the balance and any cups on it.
Used for safe approach and departure from the balance during operations.
This is the highest level for balance operations.

balance_right_above.description:
Move the robot to RIGHT ABOVE the balance.
This should be directly above the balance, lower than safe height.
Used for precise positioning before final placement/pickup.
This is the intermediate level for balance operations.

balance_position.description:
Move the robot to the BALANCE location where cups will be placed for measurement.
Position the gripper where it can place and retrieve cups on the balance.
This is the weighing/measurement station where each cup will be processed.
This is the lowest level - actual contact with balance.

cup_1_safe_height.description:
Position the robot at SAFE HEIGHT above Cup #1.
This should be high enough to clear the cup and allow safe movement.
The robot should be positioned above the cup area but at maximum safe distance.
This is the highest level for Cup #1 operations.

cup_1_right_above.description:
Position the robot RIGHT ABOVE Cup #1.
This should be directly above the cup, lower than safe height.
Used for precise positioning before entering the cup.
The gripper should be aligned with the cup opening.
This is the intermediate level for Cup #1 operations.

cup_1_inside.description:
Position the gripper INSIDE Cup #1.
The gripper should be positioned ready to close around the cup for gripping.
Lower the robot so the gripper is inside the cup at the proper depth.
This is the lowest level - actual contact with Cup #1.

cup_2_safe_height.description:
Position the robot at SAFE HEIGHT above Cup #2.
This should be high enough to clear the cup and allow safe movement.
The robot should be positioned above the cup area but at maximum safe distance.
This is the highest level for Cup #2 operations.

cup_2_right_above.description:
Position the robot RIGHT ABOVE Cup #2.
This should be directly above the cup, lower than safe height.
Used for precise positioning before entering the cup.
The gripper should be aligned with the cup opening.
This is the intermediate level for Cup #2 operations.

cup_2_inside.description:
Position the gripper INSIDE Cup #2.
The gripper should be positioned ready to close around the cup for gripping.
Lower the robot so the gripper is inside the cup at the proper depth.
This is the lowest level - actual contact with Cup #2.
